text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Major #COVID__19 denier, Brazil's @jairbolsonaro ,tests positive for Covid-19 after months of dismissing the seriousness of the virus. My response-now you're infected perhaps you'll start listening about the virus AND about CLIMATE CHANGE! @realDonaldTrump Your turn next I wonder
